author: Jeronimo Backes
title: DaPassword - a password manager
description: Your credentials stored securely on the cardano blockchain forever. No recurring fees. No central server controlling your data.
solution: DaPassword is a password manager that stores all your website passwords in the blockchain, along with bookmarks or anything important.
experience: Tech Lead with 20+ years of software development experience, masters degree in computer science, creator of multiple open-source projects.
